question: My father saw a dream that Sheikh Abdul Qadir Gilani said to him to call your son back to Paksitan as there is going to be some war etc in USA soon. What is the interpretation
answer:
QUESTION
I am in USA for my studies and attached with Tableeghi Jamaat. My father is in Pakistan and is of Deobandi thought. My father saw a dream that Sheikh Abdul Qadir Gilani said to him to call your son back to Paksitan as there is going to be some war etc in USA soon. What is the interpretation of this dream.
ANSWER


Share:
According to the political situation, war seems to be imminent in the US.

If your father did see the dream, I advise your father consult with his local Ulama and discuss the matter.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
